name: Sneak
description:
Can you escape Freedom City without getting caught or discovered? Even if you succeed, you can return at any time to challenge your previous best time!

Sneak is a 2D stealth platformer where you need to either carefully time your approach to the guards' and searchlights' patterns, or - if you're really good at it - use your reflexes to rush through everything lightning-quick before you even get noticed. Searchlights and guards both have graze periods representing the guards' reaction speed; move fast enough and you won't get caught. Staying a short while at the far end of a flashlight will even cause the guard to delay a bit to see if there is someone hiding in the shadows, letting you manipulate patrol paths ever so slightly!

My first game jam game ever, made in 72 hours. The theme was 'time'. No epic boss battle, but at least there's two playable characters!
